author: Aegis29

text: Valdis Story is an amazing entry in the "Metroid-vania" style of games. The soundtrack, artwork, and gameplay really make it standout. It's like a mix of Metroid and Devil May Cry.  I would highly recommend this game to anyone who is an action/adventure fan.

author: Júnior Matsuoka

text: The theme of Sir Pancakes, your typical flying dog with a top hat. The soundtrack's quality really impressed me when I booted this game without knowing too much about it. Even a side character theme like this one, which you barely hear in the game, is super solid. I'm quite excited for their next game, an SRPG called Fae Tactics.

text: +SupraDarky I've had this game in my Wishlist for a while, but never took the jump to buy it.  This is one reason to take a further look into it.  Thanks for posting!
